name: One Shot (itch) (NKX STUDIO)
description:
One Shot  is Out !!  The New Ultra Dynamic Shooter game has arrived ! 

" Ethan a hacker who got trap into his own computer by *InkA* a AI (artificial intelligence).  he has to survive to a Bloody survival game created  by *Inka*, and win in order to get back into his world . "

YOUR CHALLENGE !!!

*You have to face differents set of Enemy in differents stage, and beat the final boss in each stage to move to the next level .

IF YOU GET SHOT ONE TIME YOU DIE .

* Discover Awesomes and unique levels .

** Epic Fight against a bunch of final boss.

** Use specials movements to dodge bullets .

** Upgrade your game experience by using a lot of different weapons that will help    you to survive and win !

Wishlist the Game to be a chalenger //

 

More features will be added later.

Feel free to make a donation to improve the game.
